title: Textile, ca. 1770
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: fancy satin, brocaded
description: Two pieces of white or cream-coloured damask brocaded in rose, green and blue silk and silver metal thread. Large vertical repeat of symmetrically arranged flowers enclosed by ribbon-like bands - a/: backed with coarse linen, edged with metal ribbon and silver lace - b/: backed with coarse linen and edged with metal ribbon. b/: two piece put together in the middle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1770. Medium: silk
Technique: fancy satin, brocaded. 1934-1-1-a/c.
